title: r/Relationships My Partner Won't Stop Farting And It's Destroying Our Marriage!
description: r/Relationships_Advice WHY WON'T HE STOP FARTING?! In today's video, OP has a husband who just won't. stop. farting! It makes everything in her life smell terrible. The odor clings to him, his clothes, his bed, and every little thing in their house. She loves her husband, but the nonstop farting is tearing their relationship apart. What can she do to fix this stinky problem?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
